nodes.text: Belsus was the moon of the planet Gentes, in the Anoat sector of the Outer Rim Territories. At the time of the Iron Blockade, there were rumors that General Grievous of the Confederacy of Independent Systems had once built a laboratory there.
A young smuggler sent a member of their crew on Belsus in order to salvage valuable equipment from the ruins of Grievous' laboratory.
